I didn’t see one on the AM site but here should be a rough layout of the parts. @Nick_Lawrence or @NathanNFM should be able to help you out.

image1087×529 95.3 KB

Thanks @Peyton_Yeung

We don’t have a full guide up yet, but that CAD shot is helpful.
Here is a guide on how to grease and re-install the gears.

image656×894 120 KB

After the steps in the guide are complete the greased thrust washer goes in the end, then the Falcon 500 (with short shaft installed) gets the spline bore pinion gear placed onto it followed by the Motor Plate. This “prepared motor” is then placed into the end of the greased gearbox. With the Falcon 500, the long 10 screws thread directly into the face of the motor after passing through the holes in the motor plate.

Let me know if you have any more questions about the assembly, we are happy to help.
